definition[0]: used to say that you have exactly the same opinion as someone else
definition[1]: used to say that what is true of one thing is also true of another
example[1]: Where should she go? Mississippi? Too hot. Ditto Alabama.
definition[2]: a mark (〃) that you write immediately under a word in a list to show that the same word is repeated
definition[3]: a mark (") that you write beneath a word in a list so that you do not have to write the same word again
